artist.title: Conflict in the Sky
artist.description: A conflict between a dragon-rider and an eagle-rider. This was an attempt to be more painterly with my pencil work.

artist.title: Fantasy Sketches
artist.description: A collection of fantasy inspired sketches. Life drawing; figure experiments; perspective study. Of all of my fantasy drawings and sketches, only the portrait with a beholder had a reference from life.

artist.title: RGB Dragons
artist.description: A painting in tempera of a red, blue, and green dragon.

artist.title: Watercolor Landscape
artist.description: A watercolor painting without an attempt at being fantastic.

artist.title: Tempera Landscape
artist.description: A nightscape image rendered in tempera on paper.

artist.title: Giant Squid
artist.description: An attempt at a giant squid and an underwater castle. It would have been greatly improved if I had taken the trouble to find underwater references.

artist.title: Sci-fi Character Design 1
artist.description: A character loosely based on the Milt Rothman story “Heavy Planet”.

artist.title: Sci-fi Character Design 3
artist.description: A single-eyed slug inspired alien from a cold, low-gravity planet.

artist.title: Sci-fi Character Design 5
artist.description: A human character inspired by the bounty hunters in the movie Critters.

designer.title: Junior Class Pin
designer.description: Sketches and the winning design for my class’ Junior Class pin.

designer.title: Holiday Card
designer.description: Color studay and design for a holiday card. Rendered in tempera on paper.

designer.title: Word Play Sketches
designer.description: Typographic design and representative word play.

designer.title: Study of Contrast
designer.description: Design using only black and white (no tones). Nowadays this would be done on computer in an application like Adobe Illustrator.

designer.title: Wrap Your Heater
designer.description: Full process of thumbnails, sketches, color study, and final design for a public safety poster.

designer.title: Isometric
designer.description: A study of isometric shapes that could be created on standard graph paper.

designer.title: T-shirt Stencil
designer.description: T-shirt stencil for my successful run for Student Council President in my Sophomore year. (Slightly damaged).

designer.title: Butterfly Article (front)
designer.description: Article about the Honorable Mention for the Mordecai Anienlewicz Creative Arts Competition for the poster design based on the poem “The Yellow Butterfly” by Pavel Friedman.

designer.title: Butterfly Article (photo)
designer.description: Article about the Honorable Mention for the Mordecai Anienlewicz Creative Arts Competition for the poster design based on the poem “The Yellow Butterfly” by Pavel Friedman.
